title: Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS and Wii U
summary: Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS[lower-alpha 1] and Super Smash Bros. for Wii U[lower-alpha 2] (colloquially and collectively referred to as Super Smash Bros. 4) is a group of two 2014 crossover fighting video games developed by Bandai Namco Studios and Sora Ltd. and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo 3DS and Wii U video game consoles. The Nintendo 3DS version was released in Japan in September 2014 and in North America, Europe, and Australia the following month. The Wii U version was released in North America, Europe, and Australia in November 2014 and in Japan the following month.
